sub_title: Senior Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Advisor bij Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken

projects.title: ICT, Youth, Peace and Security
projects.description: UNFPA’s Innovation Fund winning project ICT, Youth, Peace and Security focusing on the potential role of ICT in the prevention of youth radicalization aims to develop ICT solutions to contribute to the prevention of youth radicalization.

contributors.headline: Senior Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Advisor bij Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken

projects.title: Introduction of the Non-Pneumatic Anti-shock Garment in the health system in Mauritania
projects.description: The Non Pneumatic Anti-Shock Garment is a relative new low cost garment used in the management of the obstetric hemoraghe, which promising results in other countries. Amongst others a 69% drop in mortality due to hemoraghe in Tanzania.

contributors.headline: Senior Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Advisor bij Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken
conseillère sage femme chez United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA)

projects.title: Development of webbased PME system
projects.description: The Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights Alliance in the Netherlands is an Alliance with 5 members in the Netherlands and over 40 partner organisations in Africa and Asia.  To be able to show our results at Alliance level and aggregate all data from partners a webbased monitoring system is developped.

projects.title: Enhancing maternal and child health in Senegal - Stichting Petite Cobi
projects.description: Stichting Petite Cobi is a small foundation which strives for lasting changes in the lives of women and children by improving their access to health care. Medical cost for severly ill children are paid and a dispensary constructed to ensure that children and women have access to the health care they need.

contributors.headline: Senior Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Advisor bij Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken
Support Talent Acquisition Managers in Europe Japac and TMEA with Talent Acquisition Tools Systems and Programs at Amgen

profile_positions.title: Senior Planning Monitoring and Evaluation Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Ensuring the quality of the PME system of Plan Netherlands, including the following tasks: 
- IATI+ reporting 
- Revision of the result framework (alignment with the new strategy of Plan International) 
- Development of key performance indicators 

Contributing to the quality of the PME system of the following alliances of which Plan is part: 
- Yes I Do alliance focusing on child marriage, FGM and teenage pregnancies 
- Girls' Advocacy Alliance 
- Disaster Relief Alliance 
- WASH Alliance
profile_positions.title: Senior Planning Monitoring & Evaluation Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Resource mobilization: 
- Coordination of the multidisciplinary resource mobilisation committee of UNFPA Mauritania responsible of identifying opportunities and proposal development resulting in:
        A 900 000 USD dollar grant from the government of Japan 
        A 260 000 Euro grant from the European Union 
       A 175 000 USD grant from UNFPA’s Innovation Fund
- Identifying potential private sector partners resulting in contract negotiation with Kinross Tasiast to support UNFPA’s campaign to end fistula
- Finalisation of UNFPA Mauritania’s resource mobilisation strategy for its 7th program resulting in clear approach to resource mobilisation and SMART objectives  
- Coordination the development of UNFPA Mauritania’s resource mobilisation plan for its 8th program, 
- Contribution to the finalisation of the regional resource mobilization and strategic partnership plan. 

Adolescent and Youths Reproductive Health & Rights 
-	Provided technical guidance to the Ministry of Youth and Sports for their high level round table resulted in strengthened donor engagement. 
-	Provided technical guidance to the Ministry of Health in the elaboration of the national reproductive health strategy resulting in an improved version taken modern TIC into account
-	Initiated UNFPA’s Innovation Fund winning project ICT, Youth, Peace and Security focusing on the potential role of ICT in the prevention of youth radicalization. 
-	Initiated the pilot project with the NASG life wrap for obstetric hemorrhage management, resulting in the successful introduction of the NASG in three health facilities. 
-	Monitor implementation of field activities implemented by the Ministry of Health (EmOC trainings) and the Ministry of Youth and Sports (Youth Center activities) 

Monitoring & evaluation: 
-	Contribute to all stages of the Country Evaluation of UNFPA Mauritania; 
-	Contribute to the development of the new 5 year country programme
-	Contribute to the development of the UNDAF 2015-2016
profile_positions.title: Program Analyst Maternal Health & Resource Mobilization

profile_positions.description:
Project Management: 
Managed child rights projects in Senegal and Burkina Faso focusing on ending FGM, early marriage and child labour with a total budget of 500 000 Euros annually 

Capacity Development:  
Capacity building of local partners in Burkina Faso resulting in improved proposals 

Resource Mobilisation:
Contributed to the mobilisation of a new grant from the Dutch government to contribute to end child marriage in West Africa
profile_positions.title: Project officer Senegal and Burkina Faso

profile_positions.description:
Establishing monitoring & evaluation systems:
-	Elaboration of the M&E systems of the Dutch WASH and the Dutch SRHR alliance, together with the other alliance partners resulting in extensive baselines, high-quality indicators, indicator reference sheets to ensure same understanding of indicators and high quality annual reports and plans with aggregated data.
-	Development and implementation of an improvement plan for planning, monitoring and evaluation for AMREF Netherlands resulting in improved monitoring through the consistent use of SMART indicators.

Capacity Development 
-	Build capacity of local partners of the WASH and the SRHR alliance in Benin and Ethiopia by providing training in PME as well as results based management. 
-	Development of indicator reference sheets to ensure same understanding of indicators by 53 partners in 9 different countries (and making these available in both French and English)

Leadership and Coordination 
-	Led an international team of 5 members responsible for the development of a web-based PME system for the SRHR alliance facilitating data aggregation from partner to country and alliance level. 
-	Led the Monitoring and Evaluation Community of Practice with AMREF International to facilitate regular exchange of best practices amongst countries and mutual support.  
-	Supervised 7 research interns of AMREF Netherlands matching them with research questions of AMREF country offices, preparing them for departure to the field and overseeing the quality of research. 

Project Management: 
-	Managed the sexual and reproductive health and rights project of AMREF in Senegal which improved the online information platform on SRHR for youth. 

Resource Mobilisation: 
-	Successfully contributed to a grant proposal to the Dutch Lottery for AMREF to support the battle against FGM  
-	Contributed to EU proposal for AMREF resulting in a two million Euro grant.
profile_positions.title: Planning, monitoring evaluation and research officer

profile_positions.description:
Universal Access to Female Condom is a joint programme with Oxfam Novib, Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, I+ solutions and Rutgers WPF promoting access and use of female condoms beyond piloting phases. 

Duties and accomplishments: 
Strategic Results Support 
-	Supporting partners of the Universal Access to Female Condom Joint programme in Nigeria and Cameroon with monitoring of their activities and results.  

Evidence and Knowledge Development & Dissemination 
-	Developed a research proposal to measure the impact of the Universal Access to Female Condom Joint programme, which was implemented by external consultants
profile_positions.title: Project Officer (focusing on M&E and research)

profile_positions.description:
Besides my position in the UAFC team, I worked one day per week as programme officer at the West Africa desk with as task monitoring and evaluation of Oxfam Novib’s projects (including humanitarian projects) & partners 

Management of resources: 
- Project monitoring and entering monitoring information in Oxfam’s digital SAP system.
profile_positions.title: Programme Officer West Africa

profile_positions.description:
As assistant to the Lead Regional Manager (LRM) of Oxfam International in West Africa focusing partly on Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning (MEL), the following were my duties and accomplishments:  

Strategic Results Support 
-	Preparation and co-facilitation of the Country Analyse workshop of Oxfam International in Niger and Mali resulting in an approved country analyses leading to a joint strategies
-	Supported Oxfam affiliates in West Africa with planning, monitoring and evaluation of Joint work of Oxfam International. 
-	Development of a planning, monitoring and evaluation proposal for the West African Economic Justice campaign of Oxfam International

Process & Learning facilitation: 
-	Organisation of International Regional Steering Team meetings in Paris (8 persons), Bamako (35 persons) and Niger (10 persons).
-	Process and learning facilitation at Oxfam International Regional Steering Team meetings
profile_positions.title: LRM + MEL support West Africa

profile_positions.description:
Assisting the starting Plan Rwanda office  opened late 2006,  I achieved the following results: 

Evidence and Knowledge Development & Dissemination 
-	Prepared the country analysis of Plan Rwanda informing its first strategic plan 
-	Prepared quarterly reports for the regional office. 

Capacity development in M&E 
-	Build capacity of Plan International Rwanda in Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation by rolling out its corporate PME system. 

HIV/AIDS & Health 
-	Participated in coordination meetings amongst key stakeholders in health and HIV/AIDS 
-	Represented Plan Rwanda in a regional HIV/AIDS meeting of Plan International.
profile_positions.title: PME and health coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Description of your duties and related accomplishments (which were split 50/50 between my role as programme officer West Africa and policy officer) 

Project management 
-	Managed, monitored and evaluated development programmes of Plan Netherlands in Burkina Faso and Niger resulting in projects with 100% implementation rate. Projects focused on different topics including education, child rights, nutrition and emergency relief. 
-	Provided recommendations for the improvement of management of food relief interventions by Plan International after researching this topic.

Monitoring and Evaluation
-	Assessed the quality of evaluation reports of Plan Netherlands and provided recommendations for improvement of the quality of the evaluation system 

Strategic Results Support 
-	Contributed to the annual reporting and planning of Plan Netherlands by data aggregation of project results.
profile_positions.title: Programme officer West Africa & Policy Officer
